author: Betsy Dickerson
title: All The Best Deals On Amazon Today
text:
View this image › 
Alice Mongkongllite / BuzzFeed We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales from the links on this page. 
ID: 10730345 1. 65% off a 10-piece makeup brush set with a holder + travel-case-in-one . View this image › 
amazon.com Get it for $15.99 ($30 off the list price). 
ID: 10730467 2. 73% off a coldbrew coffee maker . View this image › 
amazon.com Get it for $18.69 ($51.30 off the list price). 
ID: 10731498 3. 43% off a 6-quart stainless steel Crock-Pot slow cooker with lid locks for easy transport. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it for $34.30 ($25.69 off the list price).

ID: 10730757 4. Save 70% on a pair of wooden salt and pepper grinders . View this image › 
amazon.com / Via amazon.com Get it for $17.99 ($42 off the list price). 
ID: 10731080 5. 62% off of Braun Oral-B replacement toothbrush heads . View this image › 
amazon.com Get it for $8.79/8 ($14.20 off the list price). 
ID: 10730584 6. 53% off of a high-capacity power bank for charging an iPhone, iPad, Samsung Galaxy, and more. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it for $37.99 ($42 off the list price). Available in white and black.

ID: 10731728 7. Save 75% on a 48-piece set of dual-tip brush pen art markers . Get it for $31.99 ($98 off the list price). amazon.com Get it for $31.99 ($98 off the list price). 
ID: 10730615 8. Save 55% on a versatile cotton/spandex crossover v-neck dress . amazon.com , amazon.com Get it for $26.98 ($33.01 off the list price). Available in nine colors, sizes M-XXL. 
ID: 10731169 9. 29% off of a genuine leather tote available in black , blue , brown , and wine . View this image › 
amazon.com Get it for $51.99 ($20.89 off the list price). 
ID: 10731387 10. 45% off of a 3-piece set of packing cubes . amazon.com Get it for $21.99 ($18.01 off the list price). Available in 11 colors.

For 47% off a 7-piece set, click here . 
ID: 10731229 11. 30% off the Ninja Nutri Bowl DUO , which blends your favorite smoothies in a cup AND processes, chops, and mixes ingredients in a bowl using the same stand. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it for $97.99 ($42 off the list price). 
ID: 10730855 12. 42% off of a metal utility space heater . View this image › 
amazon.com Get it for $18.99 ($14 off the list price).

amazon.com Get My First Mind Blowing Science kit for $16.74 ($7.25 off the list price). 
ID: 10731513 14. 39% off of organic coconut oil . View this image › 
amazon.com Get it for $17.79 ($28.99 off the list price).

amazon.com Get them for $33.75 ($11.25 off the list price). Available in brown and black, sizes 6-10.

amazon.com Get it for $7.95 ($3 off the list price).
